name: EthereumPriceonCoinbase|Real-timePrice
0:
”Alexa open Ethereum Price”
”Alexa launch Ethereum Price”
”Alexa load Ethereum Price”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ethereum price
des:
This skill will give you the real-time Ethereum Price on Coinbase.

The data is directly pulled from Coinbase server and you will know the real Ethereum price on Coinbase.


How to use 'Ethereum Price on Coinbase | Real-time Price'?

You don't need to open your Computer or unlock your phone anymore. Just say 'Alexa, open Ethereum Price' and you'll get the latest price.


How to track your Coinbase portfolio?

You can enable an other Skill named 'My Coinbase Portfolio | Track your Coinbase wallet'. It will allow you to know your Coinbase balance.


----CREDITS----

This Skill is not created by, affiliated with, or supported by Coinbase, Inc. It was just built by an engineer who was passionate about Crypto and Voice app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
